headline: Assessing Norfolk Southern After 22% Rally and Industry Upgrade Plans in 2025
summary: Wondering if Norfolk Southern is a bargain right now? You're not alone, as many investors are taking a closer look at its price and underlying value. After gaining 22.0% year-to-date and 8.7% in the past 12 months, Norfolk Southern's stock has caught attention with its steady movement, especially compared to the wider market. Some of this momentum reflects the company's response to recent infrastructure investments and regulatory developments, including renewed focus on rail safety and...
